entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of snow squalls early this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:05 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:05 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:05 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
